isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - CAB DOOR WINDOW REGULATOR ARM ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR WINDOW REGULATOR ARM ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Remove Cab Door Window Regulator Arm Assembly on Daycab and Sleeper Cab

step1.para:
Remove cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
. If cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Remove cab door vapor barrier, refer to
CAB DOOR VAPOR BARRIER
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
. If cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Remove cab door window electric motor, refer to
CAB DOOR WINDOW ELECTRIC MOTOR
. For removing cab door window electric motor, refer to Remove Cab Door Window Electric Motor on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 39
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If vehicle is equipped with electric door window, temporarily connect electric window switch panel (Item 3) on cab door trim panel (Item 4) and lower cab door glass (Item 1) to the bottom of cab door (Item 2).

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 41
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If vehicle is equipped with manual door window, temporarily place window regulator handle (Item 1) on window regulator handle shaft (Item 2) and lower cab door glass (Item 3) to the bottom of cab door (Item 4).

Working through cab door access opening (Item 5), using a blunt tip flat blade screw driver (Item 6), carefully pry window regulator arm (Item 7) and pivot ball (Item 8) from cab door window slide block (Item 9) in cab door window slide rail (Item 10), driver side shown.
Slide cab door glass (Item 3) to the top of cab door (Item 4) and support it there.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 52 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove torx head bolt (Item 1) from inner cab door handle (Item 2), driver side shown.
Slide inner cab door handle (Item 2) to the right enough to pull both retaining tabs (Item 3) out of modular door hardware assembly (Item 4), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 53 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Rotate inner cab door handle (Item 1) so the bottom of it rest above window regulator assembly coil spring (Item 2), driver side shown.

warning.para: Be sure to use an appropriate tool and use care when removing window regulator assembly coil spring from behind retaining tab on modular door hardware assembly per step 11 below, to prevent bodily injury since the window regulator assembly coil spring will be in the loaded position during removal.

step1.para: Using an appropriate tool, release window regulator assembly coil spring (Item 2) from retaining tab (Item 3) on modular door hardware assembly (Item 4) and release tension on window regulator assembly coil spring, driver side shown.
Remove window regulator assembly coil spring (Item 2) from window regulator arm assembly shaft (Item 5), driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 53. Cab Door Window Regulator Arm Assembly and Coil Spring

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 54 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para:
Once the window regulator assembly coil spring (Item 2, Figure 53)
is removed. Use a flat blade screw driver (Item 1) in the slot of window regulator arm assembly shaft (Item 2), rotate it counter clockwise and remove window regulator arm assembly shaft from window regulator arm (Item 3). Remove window regulator arm from behind modular door hardware assembly (Item 4), driver side shown. Lay window regulator assembly coil spring, window regulator arm assembly shaft and window regulator arm out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 54. Window Regulator Arm and Window Regulator Arm Assembly Shaft

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side cab door window regulator arm and window regulator arm assembly shaft.
